original_text: Early the next morning, Abimelech called together his officers. He told them what had happened. When the officers heard about it, they were very afraid.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 그 날 아침에 일찍이 일어나 모든 종들을 불러 그 모든 일을 말하여 들려 주니 그들이 심히 두려워하였더라

sentences.original_text: He told them what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 무슨 일이 있었는지 그들에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: When the officers heard about it
